title: Error when doing shap dependence plot of a single variable
body:
The model is a RandomForestClassifier from sklearn, when I try to create the dependence plot from a single value:

`shap.dependence_plot("S", shap_values, x_train)
`

I get the following error:


```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-38-edb030e2d89c> in <module>()
----> 1 shap.dependence_plot("S", shap_values, x_train)

/usr/local/lib/python3.6/dist-packages/shap/plots/dependence.py in dependence_plot(ind, shap_values, features, feature_names, display_features, interaction_index, color, axis_color, dot_size, x_jitter, alpha, title, xmin, xmax, show)
     80 
     81     # allow vectors to be passed
---> 82     if len(shap_values.shape) == 1:
     83         shap_values = np.reshape(shap_values, len(shap_values), 1)
     84     if len(features.shape) == 1:

AttributeError: 'list' object has no attribute 'shape'
```
